_header: Lady Saint Mary mother and maid
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary — eleven monorhyming quatrains

BLAdd27909.First Lines:
Leuedi sainte marie moder and meideÞu ƿisie me nuþe
                    for ich eom eirede…
BLAdd27909.Last Lines:
…hƿanne ich ihurde of gode seke ne hedd ich hƿat me
                    sedehƿan ich hier of reken i schal ƿel sore me mei
                    drede
